data_description.name: Location name. Used as the config entry and service name
data_description.api_key: A unique alphanumeric string that associates your Google billing account with Google Weather API
data_description.referrer: Specify this only if the API key has a [website application restriction](https://developers.google.com/maps/api-security-best-practices#restricting-api-keys)

error.cannot_connect:
Unable to connect to the Google Weather API:

{error_message}
